head.title: Change {{FileFormatUp}} pages orientation in {{EnvName}} apps
head.description: Use {{ProdFullName}} to adjust {{FileFormatUp}} page orientation (portrait or landscape). Manage PDFs, Word docs, Excel sheets, PowerPoint slides, Visio files, images, archives, and more with ease.

header.title: Page orientation control in {{FileFormatUp}}
header.description: {{ProdFullName}} equips {{EnvNameShort}} apps with handy tools. Developers can enhance their projects by managing popular file formats and tweaking {{FileFormatUp}} page orientation.
header.subtitle: {{ProdFullName}}

about.title: {{ProdShortName}} Overview
about.content: [{{ProdFullName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) is a tool for managing documents in over 50 formats, like PDF, Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Visio, images, and archives. It lets you merge, split, extract, move, swap, delete, or rotate pages. Add robust document control to your apps.

more_features.title: Flexible document content management
more_features.description: {{ProdFullName}} offers a full set of tools to handle content in over 50 popular file formats with smooth, efficient processing.

feature_1.title: Merge various file formats
feature_1.content: Combine PDFs, Word files, slides, spreadsheets, Visio diagrams, images, and archives. Customize the process for the best outcome.

feature_2.title: Manage document pages
feature_2.content: Rearrange pages by moving, swapping, or deleting them to organize your content better.

feature_3.title: Control page layout
feature_3.content: Rotate pages to a set angle or switch between portrait and landscape modes.

feature_4.title: Extract pages as separate files
feature_4.content: Pick a page or a range of pages and save them as a new file wherever you want.

formats.title: Change page orientation for many formats
formats.description: {{ProdShortName}} works with over 50 file formats, making it easy to tweak documents with a variety of operations.

operations.title: Key features
operations.description: Check out the features that can boost your projects.

examples.comment_2: Pick the page to change orientation for
examples.comment_3: Set the page orientation as needed

content.title: Use [{{ProdShortName}}]({{PlatformLink}}) to adjust {{FileFormatUp}} page orientation. This feature, along with others, brings solid document management to {{EnvName}} projects.
content.step_2: Select the page number to adjust.
